Method Detail

parse

public java.lang.String parse(java.lang.String var,
                              java.lang.String template)
parse( String var, String template ) Takes a String as a "template" and inserts a given String variable into the defined place. Only parses first found match of variable format %var% in the template String.

Require:
Template String must contain a %var%.
Ensure:
A new string is created.
